name: Teravd
description:
Game developed during Mini Jam 67: Void.

This is a 3D Jump'n'Run game that also has some puzzly elements. 

Controls:

WASDMovementShiftSpeed up movementSpaceJumpS (Mid Air)Slow DownEPick up ItemQDrop ItemLeft Mouse ButtonInsert ItemEscapePause Menu

Depending on whether people show interest, the game might be further developed.

The game is developed only by myself using Unity and no third party content.
